divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to the yard last night to take my dog for a walk at about 9:00P.M. I looked up at the sky in south west direction and noticed 5 orange globe shaped lights . They were flying at a slow speed ,at different altitudes in no particular formation. I have never seen anything like them before and could not identify them. 4 of them went behind some trees and never emerged and the 5th continued it's flight over the trees and simply disappeared. i only saw for 3 minutes or less. This sighting took place on May 18,2013
Summary: I observed 5 orange round globe shaped lights Flying together at a slow speed but not in a particular formation. 4 of the objects diapeared be hind some trees and never emerged. The 5th one flying higher than trees continued past the trees and disapeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cogan Station
This sighting has never been favorited.
